q: statement. "It is also morally wrong to take the taxpayer dollars of millions of pro-life Americans and use them to promote abortion at home or abroad." "Last year," said Mike Pence , Planned Parenthood received more than$ 363 million in revenue from government grants and contracts. During that same time, they performed an unprecedented 324,008 abortions. The largest abortion provider in America should not also be the largest recipient of federal funding under Title X. Mike Pence said his bill would "prevent any family planning funds under Title X from going to Planned Parenthood or other organizations that perform abortions. Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand told US television Sunday she had visited Gabrielle Giffords the previous day and found her "doing great" and "making progress every day." Gabrielle Giffords is using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand told NBC's "Meet The Press" program. "It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury," she added. Another congressional colleague

It felt like we were at UConn in http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_1st_Win_as_a_Pistons_vs_Kings_30pts_9asts_7rebs_08/09_NBA For a veteran like Allen Iverson , a win in November against a lottery team rarely registers as important. After losing his first two games with his new team, that wasn't the case with this victory. Allen Iverson had 30 points, nine assists and provided a spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night. current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research. Even if it surpasses 31,000 employees this year, Google Inc. will still have far fewer people than Microsoft Corp., among its fiercest rival.
